column1: Uchi////My second experience (yesterday) featured Chef Paul Qui from Austin
column2: making the venture to good ole' Houston to cook some of the dishes that were featured on Top Chef. In all honestly
column3: all the dishes were amazing in presentation
column4: but necessarily in taste. True to Uchi form
column5: each dish played off of a myriad of flavors and textures
column6: but in two out of the three dishes the overall flavors were so subtle that the presentation was all I really enjoyed. However
